title: #123 - Plato's Republic
description: What is justice? What does a just society look like? Is it based completely around Dungeons & Dragons and beer? Probably not! This week, Connor and Dan are discussing Plato's Republic, AKA the philosopher's guide to fascism. There's guardians, there's working class stiffs, there's philosopher kings. This republic has it all, baby! Also, Connor has a disturbing breakthrough about his past experience with Porky's. And Dan has a refreshing afternoon cocktail. All that and maybe two more things on this week's ep!
